title: Internet Archive Decentralized Web
description: Internet Archive Decentralized Web helps you create your own offline digital library e.g. from http://dweb.archive.org
extra_description: It includes a crawler that can regularly synchronize local collections, against a list of Internet Archive items and collections, and those collections can be moved between installations.  When connected to the internet, it works as a Proxy, i.e. it will store Internet Archive content the user views for later offline viewing.
